    Utilities for the Java Security Provider class.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Provider configure​(Provider provider, String config)
      Since we also want to compile for Java 8 (that doesn't have the configure method) we use reflection.

      Since the Provider.isConfigured method does not exist for Java 8, when encapsulate this method.

    • Method Detail

      • isConfigured

        public static boolean isConfigured​(Provider provider)
        Since the Provider.isConfigured method does not exist for Java 8, when encapsulate this method.
        Parameters:
        provider - the provider
        Returns:
        true if the provider is configured and false otherwise

      • configure

        public static Provider configure​(Provider provider,
                                 String config)
        Since we also want to compile for Java 8 (that doesn't have the configure method) we use reflection.
        Parameters:
        provider - the provider
        config - the config data
        Returns:
        an updated provider

      • isModernProvider

        public static boolean isModernProvider()
        Predicate that tells whether we are working with Java > 8.
        Returns:
        true if we can assume a Java version greater than 8 and false otherwise

      • java8CreateSunPkcs11Provider

        public static Provider java8CreateSunPkcs11Provider​(String configData)
        If we are running Java 8 the method is used to create a SunPKCS11 provider.
        Parameters:
        configData - config data
        Returns:
        a Provider
